thought: I need to implement the PostgreSQL query action with the specific SQL query to select title and author from bloomberg_articles with a limit of 5.
plan: Set the params for the postgres executeQuery action with the SQL query: SELECT title, author FROM bloomberg_articles LIMIT 5;
Test the action to verify it returns the expected output with title and author fields.
criticism: Currently, the action_0 has no params set, so it doesn't execute the query. Setting the correct query is essential for the workflow to work.
